analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol#359-360:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'Sgame' of EtherWild.CreateOffer_internal (/unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol#130) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'SkipOffer' of EtherWild.CancelSimpleOffer_internal (/unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol#229-231) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'WantInOffer' of EtherWild.PlaySimpleGame (/unique_chucks/18/0x06300cec31cf8edf74a17dac79cbc66355113179.sol#285) is not in mixedCase
